description: Jade Indica and Chloe Camilla get themselves in big trouble when they lose a lot of money and can't pay off their debt. They learn about an underground sex slave operation where the kind of money could be made to get them out of their dilemma. But submitting to this kinky underworld is much harder then they anticipated with Bobbi Starr as the head mistress and Mark Davis as the client. This movie is action packed with great chemistry featuring bondage, domination, group sex, fisting, anal sex, squirting, orgasms and much more!
title: A Day In Slavery
